notes.body: Hello Ravinder,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is with regards to your order #654517091608272896-98050. I see that your order was cancelled on 2nd December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     I see the refund of Rs. 3055.48 was initiated on 02nd December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days from the date of initiation. You can track your refund via ARN number: 570208365962.  Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times.     I would request you to place a new order, and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.   Be rest assured as I have jotted down the details of your experience, and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.   For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!   Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Anisha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653800940049768448-92248, I can see a return request is already raised for the damaged MINTOP FORTE 2% BOTTLE OF 60ML SOLUTION on 3rd December 2025. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.   Please be informed, items being returned should be with labels and barcode intact.   The medicines will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.      I request you to send us the images of the products along with the barcode sticker (QR code), MRP and batch number affixed.      Awaiting your earliest response.   Regards,  Neeha

notes.body: Hello Lyra,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I will surely assist you with this.  ​  I would like to inform you that you can place an order without a prescription. However, if the requested medicine requires a prescription, we can arrange a callback from our doctor for a teleconsultation to process your order. Please note that, as an exception, certain medicines still require a valid prescription to place an order from your end.   ​   Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.  ​   However, the order ID 654933109559705600 has already been cancelled by you. As per our records, your refund of Rs. 1178.84 was initiated on 03rd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays, and bank holidays are not considered business days.     You can track your refund via the ARN number: 17647035025602c16356.  ​   Awaiting your response.  ​   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Lyra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I will surely assist you with this.
​
I would like to inform you that you can place an order without a prescription. However, if the requested medicine requires a prescription, we can arrange a callback from our doctor for a teleconsultation to process your order. Please note that, as an exception, certain medicines still require a valid prescription to place an order from your end. 
​
Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.
​
However, the order ID 654933109559705600 has already been cancelled by you. As per our records, your refund of Rs. 1178.84 was initiated on 03rd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays, and bank holidays are not considered business days.

You can track your refund via the ARN number: 17647035025602c16356.
​
Awaiting your response.
​
Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear sir 
I attempted to purchase the injection “Prolia” through PharmEasy on 01.12.25 and made a payment of ₹14,000. After about an hour, I was informed that the order was cancelled due to the absence of the doctor’s signature on the prescription.
Since the medication was urgent, I obtained a freshly signed prescription from the doctor and placed a new order, again paying ₹14,000. However, after a few hours, this order too was cancelled, this time citing non-availability of stock.
I have not yet received any refund for the payments made, which is preventing me from purchasing the medicine from the open market. This experience amounts to harassment and has caused undue inconvenience.
Rajesh Tiwari 8200295417

notes.body: Hello Kezia Pereira,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With referance to below mail.  For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:  Visit the “My Orders” section in your account. Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option. A coupen code will be displayed on the screen. Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation. Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.  Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards, Reshma Kokare PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Kezia Pereira,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With referance to below mail.
For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:

Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.
Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.
A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.
Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.
Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.

Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Avijit,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is in regard to order #654724941248962560-85531.     As per the update received, we have raised a return request for the item SHELCAL 500MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS - quantity - 4. The items will be picked up within 24 hours. Once the items are picked, they will be verified within 48 hours. Post verification, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days.      Please return only the items for which the request is raised. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.      Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Nisha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    I see that your order #655027249232977920-58596 was assigned for a free consultation with our tie-up doctor. As per the records, your order has been cancelled by our partnered doctor because you have refused for a teleconsultation. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.     Please be informed that our doctor can connect with you via a normal call using either the registered number or the delivery number provided. Unfortunately, teleconsultation via WhatsApp is not available at this time.   I request you to place a new order with a valid prescription to avoid a doctor's consultation. You can also opt for a free consultation at the time of placing the order.          You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599     I see the refund of Rs. 2783.53 was initiated today. notes.body_html:
Hello Nisha,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I see that your order #655027249232977920-58596 was assigned for a free consultation with our tie-up doctor. As per the records, your order has been cancelled by our partnered doctor because you have refused for a teleconsultation. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please be informed that our doctor can connect with you via a normal call using either the registered number or the delivery number provided. Unfortunately, teleconsultation via WhatsApp is not available at this time.

I request you to place a new order with a valid prescription to avoid a doctor's consultation. You can also opt for a free consultation at the time of placing the order.

You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.
https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599

I see the refund of Rs. 2783.53 was initiated today. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days from the date of initiation. You can track your refund via ARN number: 533704647184.

Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on the Bank turnaround times. I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ramswaroop,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Rajesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand you wish to return the medicine from your order #646022334408044544-36744. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.          To assist you further, please help us with the name and the quantity of the damaged medicines that you want to return.      The images shared by you are not getting opened, please send us the images in JPEG or PDF format.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Neeha

notes.body: Hello Nirmal,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #652157650405892096-39087.      We can see that your order was canceled on 6th December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.3882.34 /- initiated on 6th December 202 and same will be refunded to your source account within 5-7 business days.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Nirmal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #652157650405892096-39087. 
 
We can see that your order was canceled on 6th December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.3882.34 /- initiated on 6th December 202 and same will be refunded to your source account within 5-7 business days.
 
We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.
 
Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: ​​​​Hello George,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the coupon code.     Please note that we do provide up to 12% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/ website.      For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.     I am sorry to inform you that we do not have any special coupon codes for your profile.     Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
​​​​Hello George,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the coupon code.

Please note that we do provide up to 12% medicine/product level discount to all of our customers. The discount details can be checked while placing an order. However, I would like to inform you that we have multiple active offers updated on the app/ website. 

For your future orders, you can refer to the link: https://PharmEasy.in/offers?src=header.

I am sorry to inform you that we do not have any special coupon codes for your profile.

Also, you may contact us at 99929 99929 to place an order over the phone. Moreover, kindly confirm whether you want a callback from our certified pharmacist to place an order.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal
Asked for callback

helpdesk_ticket.subject: India insurance growth moderates | Clean energy outpaced fossil | Power grid investment rises
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
EXCLUSIVES
PLN expands gas, LNG network to support rising renewables
Gas is the stabilising force that lets the grid absorb more variable output.
Dec 01 2025
Companies told to drop manual systems as 2030 renewable deadline nears
They risk falling further behind if they fail to modernise.
Dec 01 2025
DANA Indonesia launches verified digital wallet for teens
The move targets a group often overlooked in policy and product design.
Nov 30 2025
Singapore’s CNE plans over $1b push into Asian renewables
It’s working with banks on financing and will issue REITs to diversify funding sources.
Nov 26 2025
TOP NEWS
In FocusIndia insurance market sees moderating premium growth: Report
Growth in key lines is being weighed down by a slowdown in agriculture and motor.
Clean energy outpaced fossil fuel investments in 2024, IRENA says
Combined investment in clean energy technology amounted to an estimated $1.19t.
Global power grid investment reaches US$359b in 2024: report
But it fell short of the USD671b annual investments needed to be reached between 2025 and 2030, IRENA said.
7MM autism spectrum disorder market to be valued at $2b by 2034
Thanks to the anticipated launch of five late-stage pipeline products.
India’s installed power capacity hits 5.05 Lakh MW
Non-fossil fuel sources dominated the total capacity.
Medical membranes market to be valued at $6.66b by 2030
Growth in drug delivery and tissue regeneration drives market growth.
India’s MRI systems market to see 12% CAGR growth until 2035
The country accounts for nearly 22% of the Asia-Pacific market.
Singapore consumers show rising openness to agentic AI shopping
By 2030, consumers expect about 10% of their online purchases to be made through AI agents. 
COMMENTARY
Turning the tide on friendly fraud as Asia’s payments surge
Matthew Driver
CO-WRITTEN ARTICLES & SPONSORED CONTENT
Keeping Asia’s digital transformation secure in the age of AI
Automating zero trust: How ViewQwest and Zero Networks are changing the game with automated microsegmentation
Gen AI in the digital workplace, from vision to execution
Why Gen AI demands more than digital upgrades for Asian businesses
WHAT’S COMING UP

Mar
26

EVENT NEWS
Converge ICT Solutions Inc. honoured at Asian Innovation Excellence Awards 2025
The broadband provider earned an accolade for bringing prepaid fiber to underserved communities.
PETRONAS recognised at Asian Innovation Excellence Awards 2025 for reimagining oil and gas operations
The company’s Enterprise AI Agent Programme has empowered employees to automate workflows, achieving multi-million-dollar efficiency gains across its Malaysian operations.
Empower transformative advisory practices with QuickBooks Advanced
Experts discussed how advanced accounting tools enable firms to scale operations, enhance advisory services, and embrace technology.
EY’s Jason Seng emphasises the need to align people, purpose, and capability to stay agile
He stressed that as organisations accelerate digital and AI-led transformation, leaders must ensure that technology serves people.

notes.body: Hello Sumanta,  Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is in regard to order #649833962505367552-73946.  We have received an update from our courier partner stating that your order was cancelled after multiple attempts. PharmEasy wishes to provide the best service to its customers. It was never our intention to disappoint you by any means, and we apologise for the same. Please be assured, the necessary feedback has been shared with the courier partner to serve you better ahead.   A refund of Rs. 404.30 is initiated to your account on 01.12.2025. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. You can track your refund via ARN number: ​570108820793    .     Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this.  As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 30 to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. This amount will expire on 26.05.2026 at 11.59 PM.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!   Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Sumanta,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to order #649833962505367552-73946.

We have received an update from our courier partner stating that your order was cancelled after multiple attempts. PharmEasy wishes to provide the best service to its customers. It was never our intention to disappoint you by any means, and we apologise for the same. Please be assured, the necessary feedback has been shared with the courier partner to serve you better ahead.
 
A refund of Rs. 404.30 is initiated to your account on 01.12.2025. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 5-7 business days. You can track your refund via ARN number: ​570108820793    .

Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this.

As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 30 to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. This amount will expire on 26.05.2026 at 11.59 PM. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

Hello Kishan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654179711251382272-53580, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

With regard to your order #654528205912260608-82858, I understand your concern. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused, and I will surely assist you with the same.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal
